item.title: A Space Invasion for Christmas
item.description: This cool guy that I know reached out to me about a quick little project - A Christmas Themed Space Invaders - with a very quick turnaround time. Some googling lead to an MIT licensed Space Invaders by John Resig - who incidentally has a totally kick-ass project on Ukiyo-e. Swapping the sprites was a straightforward redefining of rects against a new spritesheet, but the original code had no sound effects.
